namespace = SYS_Pulse
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.001
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = AAA
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_wasteland = no
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_province_flag = Plague
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = Plague0
						}
						contgroup = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aaf
										which = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = ActivePlague0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										NOT = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kyv
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
										}
										had_province_flag = { 
											flag = Plague0
											days = 486
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										NOT = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kyo
													value = 1
												}
											}
										}
										NOT = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kyq
													value = 0.05
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = Plague0
							clr_province_flag = max_death
							clr_province_flag = PlagueSpawner
							clr_province_flag = PlagueTNM0
							clr_province_flag = PlagueTNM0
							set_variable = { 
								which = kyo
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kyq
								value = 0
							}
							remove_province_modifier = Plague_mod0
							remove_province_modifier = Plague_mod_m0
							remove_province_modifier = Plague_mod_s0
							remove_province_modifier = Plague_Spawn0
							clr_province_flag = Plague
							add_province_modifier = { 
								name = Plague_Passed0
								duration = 365
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = kyu
											value = 5
										}
									}
								}
								hidden_effect = { 
									province_event = { 
										id = MEC_ProvinceInteraction.1
										days = 2
									}
								}
							}
							contgroup = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aaf
											which = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								clr_province_flag = ActivePlague0
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = Plague0
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_province_flag = PlagueSpread0
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_province_flag = PlagueCD0

								}

									limit = {

													AND = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = kyq
															value = 0.9
														}
													}
												}
												random_list = { 
													75 = { 
														set_province_flag = PlagueSpread0
													}
													25 = { }
												}
											}
											else = { 
												random_list = { 
													65 = { 
														set_province_flag = PlagueSpread0
													}
													35 = { }
												}
											}

												55 = { 
													set_province_flag = PlagueSpread0
												}
												45 = { }
											}
										}

									else = {

											45 = { 
												set_province_flag = PlagueSpread0

									limit = {

										limit = {

													}

																							set_province_flag = PlagueCD0
																							clr_province_flag = PlagueCand0
																							set_province_flag = Plague0

																								which = kyq
																								which = PREV
																							}

																								which = kyl
																								which = kyy
																							}
																							multiply_variable = { 
																								which = kyl
																								value = 0.01
																							}

																								which = kyl
																								which = kyl
																							}

																								which = kyq
																								which = kyl
																							}

																								which = kyq
																								which = kyj
																							}

																								limit = { 
																									AND = { 
																										check_variable = { 
																											which = kyq
																											which = kyo
																										}
																									}
																								}

																									which = kyq
																									which = kyo
																								}
																							}

																			limit = {

																							PREV = { 
																								set_province_flag = PlagueTNM0
																							}
																							set_province_flag = Plague
																							set_province_flag = PlagueCD0
																							clr_province_flag = PlagueCand0
																							set_province_flag = Plague0
																							set_variable = { 
																								which = kyq
																								which = PREV
																							}
																							set_variable = { 
																								which = kyl
																								which = kyy
																							}
																							multiply_variable = { 
																								which = kyl
																								value = 0.01
																							}
																							multiply_variable = { 
																								which = kyl
																								which = kyl
																							}
																							multiply_variable = { 
																								which = kyq
																								which = kyl
																							}
																							multiply_variable = { 
																								which = kyq
																								which = kyj
																							}

																								limit = { 
																									AND = { 
																										check_variable = { 
																											which = kyq
																											which = kyo
																										}
																									}
																								}
																								set_variable = { 
																									which = kyq
																									which = kyo
																								}
																							}
																							else_if = { 
																								limit = { 
																									NOT = { 
																										AND = {

																												which = kyq
																												value = 0.001
																											}
																										}
																									}
																								}

																									value = 0.001
																								}

																									duration = -1

																				}

																		}

																		}

																	}

							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = adv
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axm
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = adz
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = {

										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = {

										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axv

							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = aef
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axy
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axj
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axm
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axp
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axs
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = axy
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = arf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axj
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axm
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axp
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axs
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axv
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = axy
							which = arf
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axj
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axm
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axp
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axs
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axv
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axy
						value = 100
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aap
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aib
							which = aai
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aib
							which = aap
						}
					}
					else = {

							which = aib
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {

									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}

							which = aii

							which = aii
							which = aar
						}

					else = {

						}

	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.002
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = AAA
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = POP_Init
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.3
				}
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							any_owned_province = { 
								has_province_flag = Plague
							}
						}
						set_global_flag = Plague
					}
					else = { 
						clr_global_flag = Plague
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = total_development
					2000 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									government_rank = 6
								}
							}
							set_government_rank = 6
						}
					}
					750 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									NOT = { 
										government_rank = 5
									}
									government_rank = 6
								}
							}
							set_government_rank = 5
						}
					}
					400 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									NOT = { 
										government_rank = 4
									}
									government_rank = 5
								}
							}
							set_government_rank = 4
						}
					}
					100 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									NOT = { 
										government_rank = 3
									}
									government_rank = 4
								}
							}
							set_government_rank = 3
						}
					}
					30 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									NOT = { 
										government_rank = 2
									}
									government_rank = 3
								}
							}
							set_government_rank = 2
						}
					}
					1 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								government_rank = 2
							}
							set_government_rank = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = no
							NOT = { 
								is_month = 2
							}
							AND = { 
								is_month = 7
								NOT = { 
									is_month = 8
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								employed_advisor = { 
									category = ADM
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = hxo
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxo
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxp
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								employed_advisor = { 
									category = DIP
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = hxr
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxr
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxs
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								employed_advisor = { 
									category = MIL
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = hxu
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxw
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxu
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = hxv
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = hzb
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = hzb
						value = 1
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = {

								}
							}

									which = jwf

								}

							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									stability = 2

									which = jwf
									value = 1.1
								}
							}

									NOT = {

									}

								which = hzc

										which = asr

												}

										set_variable = { 
											which = asq

								}

								limit = {

								}

												}
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = asq
											value = 100
										}
									}
									else_if = {

										which = jwf
										value = 5.001
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = jwf
											value = 7.501
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = -15
							add_republican_tradition = -15
							add_devotion = -15
							add_horde_unity = -15
							add_meritocracy = -15
							hidden_effect = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											stability = -2
										}
									}
									set_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
								else = { 
									add_stability = -3
								}
							}
							tooltip = { 
								add_stability = -3
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_emperor_of_china = yes
								}
								add_mandate = -15
							}
							remove_country_modifier = Reform_CD_3
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD_3
								duration = 3650
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD
								duration = 3650
							}
							custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = jwf
										value = 7.501
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = jwf
											value = 10.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = -20
							add_republican_tradition = -20
							add_devotion = -20
							add_horde_unity = -20
							add_meritocracy = -20
							hidden_effect = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											stability = -2
										}
									}
									set_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
								else = { 
									add_stability = -4
								}
							}
							tooltip = { 
								add_stability = -4
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_emperor_of_china = yes
								}
								add_mandate = -20
							}
							remove_country_modifier = Reform_CD_4
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD_4
								duration = 4015
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD
								duration = 3650
							}
							custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = jwf
										value = 10.501
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = jwf
											value = 12.501
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = -25
							add_republican_tradition = -25
							add_devotion = -25
							add_horde_unity = -25
							add_meritocracy = -25
							hidden_effect = {

									limit = {

										}
									}
									set_variable = { 
										which = ahf

								else = {

							}
							tooltip = { 
								add_stability = -5
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_emperor_of_china = yes
								}
								add_mandate = -25

						else = { 
							add_legitimacy = -30
							add_republican_tradition = -30
							add_devotion = -30
							add_horde_unity = -30
							add_meritocracy = -30
							hidden_effect = { 
								if = { 
									limit = {

									}
									set_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0

								}
								else = {

								add_stability = -6
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_emperor_of_china = yes
								}
								add_mandate = -30
							}
							remove_country_modifier = Reform_CD_5
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD_5
								duration = 5475
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Reform_CD
								duration = 3650
							}
							custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
						}
						country_event = { 
							id = Rights.002
						}

							set_variable = { 
								which = osf
								which = bbu

							change_variable = { 
								which = osf

							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = osf
								value = 4
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = osg

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = osg

							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = osg
								value = 3
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = osf

							}
							set_variable = {

							change_variable = {

							divide_variable = {

							}
							change_variable = {

							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = osg

							}
							change_variable = {

								which = nmu
								value = 1
							}

					limit = { 
						total_development = 2000

						which = nmr
						value = 8
					}

				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						total_development = 750

					set_variable = {

					limit = {

					}

					limit = { 
						total_development = 30
					}
					set_variable = {

						value = 2
					}

					limit = { 
						total_development = 1
					}
					set_variable = {

				subtract_variable = {

					which = nmt

				set_variable = { 
					which = nmu
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}

	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}

country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.003
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = AAA
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							NOT = { 
								num_of_cities = 1
							}
							exists = no
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = POP_Init
					set_variable = { 
						which = hro
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.004
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Nat_Update
					ai = yes
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = Nat_Update
				set_variable = { 
					which = ani
					value = 0
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					PREV = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ani
							which = PREV
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arm
					value = 0
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = ani
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_owned_by_trade_company = yes
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arm
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asn
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = arm
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = asn
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							which = asq
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = asp
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = asr
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0.1
						}
						PREV = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ari
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arj
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					PREV = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = arm
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arm
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = arg
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = arm
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = ari
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = arm
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = arj
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = arm
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 10
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 10
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arn
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = arh
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = arh
								which = arn
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = 10
							}
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				else = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asn
					which = arg
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asq
					which = arh
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asp
					which = ari
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asr
					which = arj
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asq
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = POP_Sim
						}
					}
					remove_country_modifier = Prov_NOBlock
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = Prov_NOBlock
						duration = 1825
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arj
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arm
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arn
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arm
					value = 0
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = ani
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_owned_by_trade_company = yes
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arm
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ass
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = arm
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = ass
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							which = asv
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = asu
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = asw
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0.1
						}
						PREV = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ari
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arj
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					PREV = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = arm
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arm
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = arg
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = arm
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = ari
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = arm
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = arj
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = arj
							which = arm
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 10
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 10
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arn
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = arh
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = arh
								which = arn
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = 10
							}
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				else = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ass
					which = arg
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asv
					which = arh
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asu
					which = ari
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = asw
					which = arj
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asv
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = POP_Sim
						}
					}
					remove_country_modifier = Prov_BGBlock
					add_country_modifier = {

						duration = 1825
						hidden = yes
					}

					which = arg
					value = 0
				}

					which = arh
					value = 0

					value = 0

						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}

				every_owned_province = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = ani
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_owned_by_trade_company = yes
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arm
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = {

									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn

						}

						}

							which = arj

							which = arg
							which = arm
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							which = arm

							which = ari
							which = arm
						}

							which = arj
							which = arm
						}

							which = arg
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0.1
						}
						PREV = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ari

								which = arj
								which = PREV
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arn

							}
						}
					}

							which = arm
							which = PREV
						}

					set_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 0
					}

							check_variable = {

							which = arm

		name = no_localisation
	}

							value = 0.002
						}
						add_manpower = -0.002
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arh
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0.001
						}
						add_manpower = -0.001
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arh
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = -1
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arh
									value = 1048.576
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = {

							value = 1048.576

					}

									which = arh
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0.001
						}
						add_manpower = 0.001
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = alg
					which = export
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = alg
					which = nco
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.007
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:num_of_mercenaries
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = export
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arf
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 1.0
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = max_manpower
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf
								which = arh
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = arh
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 15
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 15
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 128
							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 128
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_128
							}
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = Stat_FLMerc_128
							duration = -1
							hidden = yes
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_128
					}
					remove_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_128
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 64
							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 64
					}
					if = {

							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_64
							}
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = Stat_FLMerc_64
							duration = -1
							hidden = yes
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_64
					}
					remove_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_64
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf

							}

					}

					}

				else_if = {

					}
					remove_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_32
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 16
							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 16
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_16

						}

					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 1
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_1
							}
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = Stat_FLMerc_1
							duration = -1
							hidden = yes
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_1
					}
					remove_country_modifier = Stat_FLMerc_1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0.02
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 1.28
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 1.28
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_1.28
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Stat_ModMerc_1.28
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_1.28
						}
						remove_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_1.28
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 0.64
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.64
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.64
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Stat_ModMerc_0.64
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.64
						}
						remove_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.64
					}
					if = {

									which = arg
									value = 0.32
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.32
						}
						if = { 
							limit = {

									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.32
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Stat_ModMerc_0.32
								duration = -1

							}

					else_if = { 
						limit = {

						}
						remove_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.32
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 0.16
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.16
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.16
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = {

									which = arg
									value = 0.04
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.04
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.04
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Stat_ModMerc_0.04
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}

						limit = { 
							has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.04
						}
						remove_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.04
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 0.02
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.02
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.02

							}

								check_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 0.01
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0.01
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.01
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Stat_ModMerc_0.01
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.01
						}
						remove_country_modifier = Stat_ModMerc_0.01
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 0
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_month = 11
						ai = yes
						is_at_war = no
						had_recent_war = 3
					}
					while = { 
						limit = { 
							num_of_mercenaries = 1
						}
						random_hired_mercenary_company = { 
							disband_mercenary_company = THIS
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.008
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = modifier:stability_cost_modifier
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahe
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahe
					value = -100
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					which = ahe
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahe
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahe
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahe
					value = 10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					which = ahf
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 10
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					which = ahd
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}

		name = no_localisation
	}

	id = SYS_Pulse.010
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation

		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = {

country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.011
	title = "SYS_Pulse.011.title"
	desc = "SYS_Pulse.011.desc"
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = AAA
	}
	immediate = { 
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				has_province_flag = DG_Update
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						religion = catholic
						religion = avignonist
					}
					has_cardinal = yes
				}
				set_province_flag = had_cardinal
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = awp
					which = aeh
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = awq
					which = aei
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = awr
					which = adw
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = awp
					which = aaw
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = awq
					which = aax
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = awr
					which = aay
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axh
					which = aeh
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axi
					which = aei
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axj
					which = adw
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axh
					value = 100
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axi
					value = 100
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axj
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ayl
					which = awp
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ayl
					which = awq
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ayl
					which = awr
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ayr
						which = ayl
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ayr
						which = aaz
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ayr
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else = {

						which = ayr

				set_variable = { 
					which = DG_Tmp1
					which = adv
				}
				change_religion = variable:DG_Tmp1
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					value = 0
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_province_flag = dg_pulse_mute
				}
				clr_province_flag = dg_pulse_mute
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					owner = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = pzp
										value = 1
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
										value = 1
										owned_by = ROOT
										OR = { 
											has_missionary = yes
											has_province_modifier = minority_missionary
										}
										OR = { 
											has_province_flag = convert_50
											has_province_flag = convert_90
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = pzp
										value = 2
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
										value = 2

									}

								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = pzp
										value = 5
									}
								}
								NOT = { 
									num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
										value = 5
										owned_by = ROOT
										OR = { 
											has_missionary = yes
											has_province_modifier = minority_missionary
										}
										OR = { 
											has_province_flag = convert_50
											has_province_flag = convert_90
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_province_flag
					convert_50 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = owner
							}
							clr_province_flag = convert_50
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									owner = { 
										any_owned_province = { 
											NOT = { 
												religion = owner
											}
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = ooo
													value = 0.3
												}
											}
											OR = { 
												has_province_flag = convert_50
												has_province_flag = convert_90
											}
											has_missionary = no
										}
									}
								}
								owner = { 
									random_owned_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												religion = owner
											}
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = ooo
													value = 0.3
												}
											}
											OR = { 
												has_province_flag = convert_50
												has_province_flag = convert_90
											}
											has_missionary = no
										}
										send_missionary = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_missionary = no
							}
							send_missionary = yes
						}
					}
					convert_90 = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = owner
							}
							clr_province_flag = convert_90
							add_province_modifier = { 
								name = minority_missionary
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_missionary = no
								NOT = { 
									religion = owner
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ooo
										value = 0.3
									}
								}
							}
							send_missionary = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdt
				value = 0
			}

				which = kdu

			set_variable = { 
				which = pte

			set_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = aeh
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = aej
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = ael
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = aen
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = aep
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = arf
				which = aer
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adv
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aeh
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aeh
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aej
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aej
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adz
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = ael
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ael
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = aeb
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aen
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aen
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = aed
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aep
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aep

					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = aef
								value = 1
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aer
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aer
						value = 1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aeh
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aej
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = ael
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf

country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.012
	title = "no_localisation"
	desc = "no_localisation"
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { }
	immediate = { 
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = yes
				OR = { 
					adm_power = 600
					dip_power = 600
					mil_power = 600
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = modifier:technology_cost
				}

					which = nnj

					which = nnk
				}

					limit = {

						NOT = { 
							has_institution = Legalism
						}
					}
					AAA = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = nnj
							which = hsr

										value = 100
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nnj
								value = 100
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nnj
							value = 0.01
						}
						PREV = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = nnj
								which = PREV
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nnj
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = modifier:adm_tech_cost_modifier
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = adm_tech
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnl
					which = export
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnl
					value = 1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					value = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						adm_tech = 6
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						which = nnl
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 0.016
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 0.106
					}
				}
				else = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 6
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						which = nnl
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = -0.016
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 0.009
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					which = nnm
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					which = nnl
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 1290
				}
				AAA = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = nnn
						which = hsr
					}
					PREV = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = nnn
							which = PREV
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					which = nnn
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 0.1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = nnm
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nnk
						which = nnm
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					which = nnj
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnp
					value = 400
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnp
					which = nnk
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnl
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnn
					value = 0
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = modifier:dip_tech_cost_modifier
				}
				set_variable = {

				}

				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					value = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						dip_tech = 6
					}

						which = nnm

					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 0.009
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk

				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm

				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 1290
				}
				AAA = {

						which = hsr
					}
					PREV = {

							which = nnn

					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					which = nnn
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 0.1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = nnm
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = {

				}
				set_variable = {

				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnq

				set_variable = { 
					which = nnk

				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnl
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm

					which = nnn
					value = 0

						which = nnm
						value = -0.016
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = nnm
						value = 0.009
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					which = nnm
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					which = nnl
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 1290

				AAA = {

						which = nnn
						which = hsr
					}
					PREV = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = nnn
							which = PREV
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					which = nnn
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 0.1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = nnm
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nnk

					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					which = nnj
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnr
					value = 400
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = nnr
					which = nnk
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnl
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnm
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnn
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnj
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nnk
					value = 0
				}
			}
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = adm_power
				value = trigger_value:adm_power
			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = adm_power
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = nni
				value = 0.75
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = nnj
				which = nnp
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = nni
							which = nnp
						}
					}
				}
				log = "TECH_FIX added administrative tech to [This.GetName], costing [This.admin_cost.GetValue] adm points"
				hidden_effect = { 
					while = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 1024
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -1024
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 1024
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 512
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -512
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 512
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 256
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -256
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 256
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 128
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -128
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 128
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 64
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -64
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 64
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 32
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -32
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 32
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 16
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -16
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 16
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 8
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -8
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 8
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 4
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -4
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 4
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 2
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -2
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = admin_cost
								value = 1
							}
						}
						add_adm_power = -1
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = admin_cost
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = admin_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				add_adm_tech = 1
			}
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = dip_power
				value = trigger_value:dip_power
			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = dip_power
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = nni
				value = 0.75
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = nnj
				which = nnq
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = nni
							which = nnq
						}
					}
				}
				log = "TECH_FIX added diplomatic tech to [This.GetName], costing [This.diplo_cost.GetValue] dip points"
				hidden_effect = { 
					while = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 1024
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -1024
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 1024
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 512
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -512
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 512
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 256
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -256
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 256
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 128
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -128
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 128
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 64
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -64
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 64
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 32
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -32
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 32
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 16
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -16
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 16
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 8
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -8
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 8
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 4
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -4
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 4
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 2
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -2
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = diplo_cost
								value = 1
							}
						}
						add_dip_power = -1
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = diplo_cost
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = diplo_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				add_dip_tech = 1
			}
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = mil_power
				value = trigger_value:mil_power
			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = mil_power
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = nni
				value = 0.75
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = nnj
				which = nnr
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = nni
							which = nnr
						}
					}
				}
				log = "TECH_FIX added military tech to [This.GetName], costing [This.milit_cost.GetValue] mil points"
				hidden_effect = { 
					while = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 1024
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -1024
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 1024
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 512
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -512
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 512
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 256
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -256
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 256
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 128
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -128
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 128
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 64
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -64
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 64
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 32
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -32
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 32
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 16
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -16
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 16
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 8
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -8
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 8
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 4
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -4
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 4
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 2
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -2
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = milit_cost
								value = 1
							}
						}
						add_mil_power = -1
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = milit_cost
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = milit_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				add_mil_tech = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = nni
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "no_localisation"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.013
	title = "no_localisation"
	desc = "no_localisation"
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		ai = yes
		dip_power = 300
		has_idea_group = exploration_ideas
		NOT = { 
			has_idea = exploration_ideas_3
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = exploration_ideas_2
			}
			add_idea = exploration_ideas_3
			add_dip_power = -250
			log = "SYS-CensusNew:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:forced progressed to exploration_idea_3"
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = exploration_ideas_1
			}
			add_idea = exploration_ideas_2
			add_dip_power = -250
			log = "SYS-CensusNew:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:forced progressed to exploration_idea_2"
		}
		else = { 
			add_idea = exploration_ideas_1
			add_dip_power = -250
			log = "SYS-CensusNew:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:forced progressed to exploration_idea_1"
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "no_localisation"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = SYS_Pulse.014
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = MEIOU_AND_TAXES_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Legalism_6.4
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Legalism_3.2

				limit = { 
					always = yes
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Requirements_Legalism
							always = yes

								}

				}

					limit = { 
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Requirements_Columbian_Exchange
							any_country = { 
								exists = yes
								OR = { 
									is_colonial_nation = yes
									AND = { 
										OR = { 
											technology_group = north_american
											technology_group = mesoamerican
											technology_group = south_american
											technology_group = andean
											technology_group = high_american
										}
										any_owned_province = { 
											has_port = yes
											NOT = { 
												continent = south_america
												continent = north_america
												continent = oceania
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					every_country = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								num_of_cities = 1
								NOT = { 
									tag = AAA
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										capital_scope = { 
											OR = { 
												continent = south_america
												continent = north_america
											}
										}
										any_owned_province = { 
											has_port = yes
											NOT = { 
												continent = south_america
												continent = north_america
												continent = oceania
											}
										}
									}
									any_subject_country = { 
										is_colonial_nation = yes
										capital_scope = { 
											OR = { 
												continent = south_america
												continent = north_america
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									Columbian_Exchange = 100
								}
								AND = { 
									Banking = 100
									has_port = yes
									has_local_modifier_value = { 
										which = trade_value
										value = 5
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = modifier:trade_value
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arg
								which = export
							}
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = 4
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = 0.25
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arg
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 2
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										Banking = 100
									}
									NOT = { 
										continent = north_america
									}
									NOT = { 
										continent = south_america
									}
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = arg
									value = 0.5
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								which = arg
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 1.5
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = 0
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 5
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 6.4
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 6.4
								}

				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Casual_Literacy_0.8

										exists = yes
										adm_tech = 31
										always = yes

								}

								num_of_cities = 1

								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Global_Trade_0.2
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 0.1
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0.1
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Global_Trade_0.1
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_6.4
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_3.2
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_1.6
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_0.8
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_0.4
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_0.2
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Academia_0.1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1610
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Requirements_Academia
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_year = 1710
									any_country = { 
										exists = yes
										adm_tech = 46
										has_institution = Scientific_Method
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					every_country = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								num_of_cities = 1
								NOT = { 
									tag = AAA
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_year = 1710
									adm_tech = 46
									any_known_country = { 
										has_institution = Academia
									}
								}
								has_institution = Scientific_Method
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									Academia = 100
								}
								AND = { 
									Scientific_Method = 100
									Legalism = 100
									NOT = { 
										unrest = 1
									}
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = ati
											value = 25
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arf
								which = dcf
							}
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 9
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 4
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 1
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 5

									AND = { 
										check_variable = {

									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 6.4
								}

				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_3.2
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_1.6
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_0.8
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_0.4
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_0.2
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Nationalism_0.1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1670
				}
				every_country = { 
					limit = {

							num_of_cities = 1
							NOT = { 
								tag = AAA
							}

						NOT = {

							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = iik
									value = 75
								}
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = Nationalism_CanSpawnCountry
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Requirements_Nationalism
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_year = 1740

										adm_tech = 52
										AND = {

											has_country_flag = Nationalism_CanSpawnCountry

							AND = { 
								num_of_cities = 1

								}
							}
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_year = 1740
									adm_tech = 52
								}
								has_institution = Casual_Literacy
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									Nationalism = 100
								}
								AND = { 
									Casual_Literacy = 100
									OR = { 
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
										has_owner_culture = yes
										culture_group = owner
									}
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = ati
											value = 25
										}
									}

							set_variable = {

								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = iik

							}

							}

								value = 20
							}

								value = 20

											value = 2

									}

									value = 2

							is_colony = yes

					}

				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_3.2

				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.2
				clr_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.1

				limit = { 
					is_year = 1710

								}

									}

										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 6.4
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_6.4
							}
							if = {

									AND = {

											which = arf
											value = 3.2
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 3.2
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_3.2
							}
							if = {

										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 1.6
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 1.6
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_1.6
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 0.8
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0.8
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.8
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 0.4
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0.4
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.4
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 0.2
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0.2
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.2
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = arf
											value = 0.1
										}
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0.1
								}
								set_province_flag = Inst_Progress_Industrialisation_0.1
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		name = no_localisation
	}
